sys_ux_client_script.name: icon_item_icon/icon

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_b75520c6474a161098481845f16d4363
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">87b1efeb835d1a10b68c9640ceaad376</macroponent><name>icon_item_icon/icon</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  console.log(api.item);
if (api.item.value.occupied == true) {
        return 'user-outline';
    } else if (api.item.value.occupied == false && api.item.value.visited == true && !api.item.value.item) {
        return 'square-outline';
    } else if (api.item.value.visited == true && api.item.value.item) {
        if (api.item.value.item.type == "reference") {
            return 'door-fill';
        } else {
            return 'document-template-outline';
        }
    }

    else {
        return 'square-question-outline';
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-11-24 18:49:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>b75520c6474a161098481845f16d4363</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>icon_item_icon/icon</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Drama" source="x_pamtn_drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b75520c6474a161098481845f16d4363</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-11-24 18:49:26</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
